items.sentence: Tom was working at his desk the last time I saw him.
I can\'t remember the last time I laughed this much.
I can\'t see anything. The windshield is very dirty.
I couldn\'t sleep well because it was noisy outside.
If my brother hadn\'t saved me, I would\'ve drowned.
Tom didn\'t tell me anything I didn\'t already know.
Tom didn\'t understand why he wasn\'t allowed to go.
I want Tom to know I didn\'t really want to do that.
I want Tom to understand why he can\'t live with us.
What\'s the best thing that\'s ever happened to you?
